defaultMessage: Are you sure? This will remove your account and log you out of the app.
Please review our {ppLink} to learn how {appName} uses and stores your information.
We will send you a file with the content and data you created and generated on {appName}. This can be kept for your records or transferred to another service.
You can request {appName} to stop processing your information under certain conditions.
If you delete your account, your personal information will be erased. Comments, annotations, and workspace activity will become pseudonymous and remain on {appName}.
